resources.string: Flashing updates in the current mode is only officially supported on TWRP recoveries. Official CWM builds are not supported, though some community-built versions of CWM may still work. Please make sure you are running a compatible recovery before continuing.

1) Edit the template in ->
/sdcard/RomAddon/persistTemplateFile.txt
2) Save the template as ->
/sdcard/RomAddon/persistFile.txt
3) Press UPDATE PERSISTENT FILE
